arts.ttl: Championship roundup: Bottom side Plymouth hit late leveller at Sunderland
arts.sum: Ogbeta’s goal denies Sunderland chance to go third West Brom hit five in thrashing of Portsmouth Sunderland missed out on the chance to close to within a point of the automatic promotion places in the Championship as Nathanael Ogbeta’s 90th-minute strike gave bottom club Plymouth a surprise 2-2 draw at the Stadium of Light. The Black Cats looked set for another home win as second-half goals from Wilson Isidor and Trai Hume overturned a Plymouth lead that had come through an own goal from home goalkeeper Anthony Patterson. However, Ogbeta struck in the final minute to secure Plymouth only a fourth away point of the season. Continue reading...

arts.ttl: Sunderland's promotion bid suffers blow as Plymouth nick late point
arts.sum: Sunderland missed out on the chance to close to within a point of the automatic promotion places in the Sky Bet Championship as Nathanael Ogbeta's 90th-minute strike gave Plymouth a 2-2 draw at the Stadium of Light.

arts.ttl: Nathanael Ogbeta salvages late point for Plymouth at Sunderland
arts.sum: The Black Cats looked set for another home win as second-half goals from Wilson Isidor and Trai Hume.
Plymouth Argyle forward Morgan Whittaker joins Championship rivals Middlesbrough.

arts.ttl: Transfer news and rumours today: Jhon Duran asking price, Dan Neil to West Ham, Fulham right-back pursuit
arts.sum: Sports Mole rounds up the latest transfer news and rumours today, including Jhon Duran's future, Dan Neil to West Ham United and Milan van Ewijk to Fulham.

arts.ttl: Sunderland player travels for medical and contract signing – Rejects 2 other clubs
arts.sum: Last month, we covered claims from Ukraine which stated FC LNZ Cherkasy and FC Metalist 1925 Kharkiv are keen on signing Sunderland’s Nazariy Rusyn on loan in the winter market. The Ukrainian won’t be returning to his country and will instead join HNK Hajduk Split in January. arts.ttl: Sunderland make ‘package offer’ to sign forward – New manager has a decision to make
arts.sum: Sunderland have made a ‘package offer’ for Besiktas’ Semih Kılıçsoy to sign him from the Turkish side this month. That’s according to journalist Gökmen Özcan, via Asist Analiz, who reports that Sunderland have made a bid that includes a purchase clause.
